review.title: “Blessed to be there!”
review.pros: Pros – The job is great! Working with the kids and the horses is the best part! The volunteers that work with us in the daily grind are wonderful and irreplaceable. I love my Job!
review.cons: Cons – It's a non-profit, so no benefits, can't always work even when things need to be done. The financial struggles can be daunting.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Y'all are great, but the horse budget really needs a boost.
